HPI 8888 Nissan Skyline GT-R V-Spec N1 (R33)

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer Page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/pop/8888/8888.html

It seems Japanese manufacturers have a unique ability to string together all kinds of acronyms and abbreviations to distinguish the different variations of a particular model. This is a 4th gen (R33) Nissan Skyline GT-R with the V-Spec and N1 upgrades:

V-Spec
[list]sportier suspension with lower ground clearance
ATTESA E-TS Pro all wheel drive
Four-wheel independent channel anti-lock braking
[/list]

N1
[list]R33 N1 engine
ABS delete (not sure if this deletes the braking from the V-Spec package ??)
A/C delete
Sound system delete
rear wiper delete
trunk carpet delete[/list]

Having got that out of the way, this is a matte black version of the road-going monster specially made for II Ado Company, a Japanese hobby shop. Matte black was not a factory paint option so this represents a somewhat customized R33. An otherwise fantastic effort is let down by the cheesy looking exhaust.
